concept.title: Release 11.5.2
concept.shortdesc: Release 11.5.2 includes the following new features.

ul.li: More in meeting moderator actions - Using the mobile client an owner can make authenticated participants moderators, a moderator can grant presenter privilege to other participants, a moderator can mute other participants and a moderator can remove a participant from the meeting.
Updated participant list - A user can open the participant list in a moderated meeting to see who the owner is, who the moderators are and, who is presenting.

End of support for preview meetings - Sametime Version 11 FP2 introduced 11.5 preview meetings. With the GA release of Sametime 11.5, these preview meetings are no longer supported. Joining these meetings from a mobile client is no longer supported.
